column1: Smoque BBQ////as for sides: if i had my way the mac and cheese would be 3x as big
column3: the sauce is creamy and the crispy crust.. oh yea. the baked beans are sweet with great chunks of tender pork
column4: the corn bread is a nice side for the meats..cole slaw comes with all the platters
column5: the dressing is light and acidic and has a nice crunch
column6: but i hate the celery seeds (! personal issue). the fries have their moments
column7: some stronger than others.. but i feel a bit too greasy after eating all the meat and fries. peach cobbler is a nice way to finish it all off
column8: but really i just want more mac and cheese :)
